title: The Straits Times
title_page: Chua Mui Hoong | The Straits Times
maintext: Chua Mui Hoong has been with the paper since 1991 and covered every election in Singapore since then, except the 2001 General Election when she was in the United States doing her Masterâ€™s in Public Administration at Harvard University. She is an English literature graduate from Cambridge University.She was the Straits Times Opinion editor previously and now writes a weekly column on issues on Fridays.
